node.title: VoiceFlowPro Desktop-Specific UX Requirements Definition
node.comment: Professional-grade desktop transcription tool requirements focused on delivering 10x value over MacWhisper through superior workflow integration, performance, and ROI-driven features. Every requirement includes measurable success metrics and value justification.

node.title: 1. Offline-First Experience Design
node.comment: Core architecture enabling full functionality without internet, with cloud as optional enhancement. This creates a moat against web-based competitors and ensures reliability for mission-critical workflows.

node.title: 1.1 Performance Requirements
node.comment: ROI: Reduces waiting time by 60% compared to cloud solutions, enabling professionals to process 2.5x more content daily.

node.title: Local Model Loading
node.comment: Success Metric: Models load in under 3 seconds on M1 Mac, under 5 seconds on Intel. Memory-mapped loading for instant subsequent starts.

node.title: Real-time Transcription Speed
node.comment: Success Metric: 1:1 real-time factor or better for medium models. Enable live captioning for meetings/interviews.

node.title: Background Processing Queue
node.comment: Success Metric: Process 50+ hours of audio overnight without supervision. Smart CPU/GPU allocation based on thermal state.

node.title: Incremental Processing
node.comment: Success Metric: Start viewing/editing partial results within 10 seconds of job start. Stream results as they complete.

node.title: 1.2 Offline Capability Matrix
node.comment: ROI: Zero dependency on internet for core features = 100% uptime for professionals in secure/remote environments.

node.title: Core Transcription Features
node.comment: All transcription, diarization, and basic AI features work offline. Only cloud sync and external integrations require internet.

node.title: Local AI Processing
node.comment: On-device LLMs for summaries, chapters, action items. Uses llama.cpp with 7B/13B models. Fallback to cloud for complex tasks.

node.title: Offline License Validation
node.comment: 30-day offline grace period for license checks. Cryptographic validation prevents piracy while enabling offline use.

node.title: 1.3 Smart Sync Architecture
node.comment: ROI: Seamless transition between offline/online saves 15 min/day in manual file management.

node.title: Differential Sync Protocol
node.comment: Only sync changes, not entire files. 90% bandwidth reduction for collaborative editing.

node.title: Conflict Resolution UI
node.comment: Visual diff viewer for transcript conflicts. One-click resolution with preview.

node.title: 2. Native File System Integration
node.comment: Deep OS integration that makes VoiceFlowPro feel like a native system utility, not just another app. Creates switching costs through workflow embedding.

node.title: 2.1 Advanced Watch Folders
node.comment: ROI: Automates 80% of import workflow, saving 30 min/day for power users processing multiple recordings.

node.title: Rule-Based Processing
node.comment: Per-folder rules: model selection, language detection, export format, naming patterns. Regex-based file filtering.

node.title: Nested Folder Monitoring
node.comment: Recursive watching with inheritance. Child folders inherit parent rules unless overridden.

node.title: Cloud Storage Integration
node.comment: Native monitoring of Dropbox, Google Drive, OneDrive folders. Process files as they sync.

node.title: Action Triggers
node.comment: Post-transcription actions: move to archive, trigger webhook, send notification, run script.

node.title: 2.2 System-Level Integration
node.comment: ROI: Reduces app-switching by 40%, keeping users in their natural workflow.

node.title: Context Menu Actions
node.comment: Right-click any audio/video file: "Transcribe with VoiceFlowPro", "Quick Transcribe" (uses last settings).

node.title: Quick Look Plugin (Mac)
node.comment: Preview transcripts directly in Finder. Space bar shows formatted transcript with playback controls.

node.title: Shell Extension (Windows)
node.comment: Windows Explorer preview pane shows transcripts. Thumbnail generation for video files.

node.title: File Type Associations
node.comment: Register as default handler for .vfp, .whisper files. Import competitor formats seamlessly.

node.title: 2.3 Smart Import Pipeline
node.comment: ROI: Handles 95% of edge cases automatically, reducing support tickets by 70%.

node.title: Format Detection Engine
node.comment: Auto-detect 50+ audio/video formats. Transparent conversion pipeline using FFmpeg.

node.title: Batch Import Optimizer
node.comment: Smart chunking for 100+ file imports. Memory-aware processing prevents system overload.

node.title: URL Intelligence
node.comment: YouTube, Vimeo, podcast RSS, direct audio URLs. Parallel download with transcription start.

node.title: 3. Professional Keyboard Shortcut Schema
node.comment: Comprehensive keyboard control rivaling professional video editors. Power users can operate entirely without mouse, increasing speed by 3x.

node.title: 3.1 Modal Editing System
node.comment: ROI: Vim-like efficiency reduces editing time by 50% for power users.

node.title: Command Mode
node.comment: Single-key commands: j/k for navigation, / for search, m for mark, y for yank. Visual feedback for mode.

node.title: Edit Mode
node.comment: In-line transcript editing with autocomplete. Tab for speaker change, Ctrl+T for timestamp insert.

node.title: Playback Mode
node.comment: Space for play/pause, [ ] for speed control, , . for frame stepping. F for fullscreen video.

node.title: 3.2 Customizable Hotkey System
node.comment: ROI: Accommodates existing muscle memory, reducing onboarding time by 70%.

node.title: Preset Schemes
node.comment: Import schemes from: Premiere Pro, Final Cut, DaVinci Resolve, VS Code. One-click switching.

node.title: Conflict Detection
node.comment: Visual conflict resolver when assigning shortcuts. Shows system-wide conflicts.

node.title: Macro Recording
node.comment: Record multi-step operations as macros. Assign to F-keys or custom combinations.

node.title: 3.3 Navigation Acceleration
node.comment: ROI: Navigate hour-long transcripts in seconds, not minutes.

node.title: Jump Commands
node.comment: Go to: timestamp (Ctrl+G), speaker (Ctrl+S), bookmark (Ctrl+B), confidence threshold (Ctrl+L).

node.title: Smart Selection
node.comment: Shift+arrows for word selection, Ctrl+Shift for sentence, Alt+Shift for paragraph/speaker turn.

node.title: Bookmark System
node.comment: Ctrl+D to bookmark, Ctrl+Shift+D for named bookmark. F2/F3 for next/previous bookmark.

node.title: 4. Advanced Window Management
node.comment: Sophisticated window behavior supporting complex multi-document workflows. Matches professional DAW/NLE applications.

node.title: 4.1 Workspace Layouts
node.comment: ROI: Context switching between tasks 5x faster with saved layouts.

node.title: Preset Workspaces
node.comment: Interview, Podcast, Meeting, Research, Translation modes. Each optimizes panels for specific workflow.

node.title: Custom Layout Save
node.comment: Save unlimited layouts. Assign to number keys (Ctrl+1-9). Include window positions, panel states.

node.title: Layout Sync
node.comment: Sync layouts across devices via cloud. Detect display configuration and adapt.

node.title: 4.2 Panel System
node.comment: ROI: Reduces window juggling by 80%, keeping all tools accessible.

node.title: Dockable Panels
node.comment: Drag panels to dock zones. Magnetic snapping with preview. Tab grouping for space efficiency.

node.title: Floating Windows
node.comment: Tear off any panel as floating. Always-on-top option. Opacity control for reference viewing.

node.title: Panel Presets
node.comment: Quick toggles: Minimal (transcript only), Standard (+ timeline), Pro (all panels).

node.title: 4.3 Multi-Instance Support
node.comment: ROI: Compare transcripts side-by-side, increasing QA efficiency by 40%.

node.title: Instance Communication
node.comment: Drag text between instances. Shared clipboard with formatting preservation.

node.title: Synchronized Playback
node.comment: Lock playback between instances for comparison. Offset support for different versions.

node.title: 5. Multi-Monitor Workflow Support
node.comment: First-class multi-display support for professional setups. Increases workspace efficiency by 200%.

node.title: 5.1 Display-Aware Layouts
node.comment: ROI: Zero setup time when connecting/disconnecting displays.

node.title: Automatic Adaptation
node.comment: Detect display changes and restore appropriate layout. Remember per-configuration preferences.

node.title: Display Profiles
node.comment: Save profiles: "Laptop Only", "Desktop Dual", "Presentation Mode". Switch via hotkey.

node.title: DPI Awareness
node.comment: Proper scaling across mixed-DPI setups. Crisp text on 4K/5K displays.

node.title: 5.2 Window Distribution
node.comment: ROI: Optimal use of screen real estate increases content visibility by 150%.

node.title: Smart Window Spawning
node.comment: New windows open on least-crowded display. Remember last position per window type.

node.title: Full-Screen Modes
node.comment: True full-screen, maximized window, presentation mode. Each with different UI hiding rules.

node.title: Video Detach
node.comment: Send video to secondary display while editing transcript on primary. Picture-in-picture fallback.

node.title: 6. Professional Audio Waveform Visualization
node.comment: Industry-standard waveform display enabling precise audio navigation and editing. Essential for professional audio work.

node.title: 6.1 Waveform Rendering
node.comment: ROI: Visual audio navigation 10x faster than scrubbing. Identifies issues before listening.

node.title: Multi-Resolution Display
node.comment: Zoom from file overview to sample-level. Smooth LOD transitions. GPU-accelerated rendering.

node.title: Spectral View
node.comment: Frequency analysis overlay. Identify speech vs music vs noise. Adjustable color mapping.

node.title: Peak Normalization
node.comment: Auto-scale to content. Compressor view for dynamic range. RMS and peak meters.

node.title: 6.2 Interactive Timeline
node.comment: ROI: Reduces navigation time by 60% for long-form content.

node.title: Segment Visualization
node.comment: Color-coded speaker segments. Confidence gradient overlay. Silence detection markers.

node.title: Annotation Layer
node.comment: Add markers, regions, notes directly on timeline. Collaborative annotations with attribution.

node.title: Playhead Control
node.comment: Click to seek, drag to scrub. Momentum scrolling. Snap to word boundaries.

node.title: 6.3 Audio Enhancement Tools
node.comment: ROI: Improve transcription accuracy by 30% on poor-quality audio.

node.title: Noise Reduction
node.comment: Real-time denoising preview. Batch processing option. Preserves original for comparison.

node.title: Volume Leveling
node.comment: Normalize speaker volumes. Compress dynamic range. Boost quiet sections.

node.title: EQ Presets
node.comment: Voice enhancement, telephone cleanup, room correction. Custom EQ curves.

node.title: 7. Batch Processing UX Patterns
node.comment: Enterprise-grade batch processing surpassing MacWhisper's basic implementation. Handles hundreds of files efficiently.

node.title: 7.1 Intelligent Queue Management
node.comment: ROI: Process 10x more files overnight with zero failures due to smart resource management.

node.title: Priority Queue System
node.comment: Drag to reorder. Priority levels (urgent/normal/low). Due date scheduling.

node.title: Parallel Processing Control
node.comment: Auto-detect optimal parallelism. Manual override (1-16 threads). GPU allocation strategy.

node.title: Failure Recovery
node.comment: Isolated failures don't stop queue. Automatic retry with backoff. Detailed error reporting.

node.title: Resource Throttling
node.comment: Limit CPU/GPU usage during work hours. Thermal management. Battery preservation mode.

node.title: 7.2 Batch Configuration Templates
node.comment: ROI: Configure once, reuse infinitely. Saves 20 min per batch job.

node.title: Processing Profiles
node.comment: Save complete configurations: model, language, exports, post-processing. Share across team.

node.title: Conditional Processing
node.comment: If-then rules: if duration > 1hr use large model, if language=Spanish use Spanish model.

node.title: Output Templates
node.comment: Filename patterns with variables. Folder structure creation. Metadata embedding.

node.title: 7.3 Progress Visualization
node.comment: ROI: Accurate time estimates enable better planning, saving 1hr/day in coordination.

node.title: Multi-Level Progress
node.comment: Overall, per-file, per-stage progress. ETA calculation with confidence intervals.

node.title: Performance Metrics
node.comment: Real-time throughput graphs. Bottleneck identification. Historical performance tracking.

node.title: Notification System
node.comment: Completion, error, milestone notifications. Email, Slack, webhook integrations.

node.title: 8. Real-time Collaboration Features
node.comment: Team collaboration features that MacWhisper completely lacks. Enables enterprise adoption and team workflows.

node.title: 8.1 Live Collaboration
node.comment: ROI: Reduce review cycles by 50% through simultaneous editing.

node.title: Presence Indicators
node.comment: See who's viewing/editing. Cursor tracking. Named selections. Color-coded contributors.

node.title: Conflict-Free Editing
node.comment: Operational transformation for concurrent edits. Automatic merge with history tracking.

node.title: Comment Threads
node.comment: Inline comments with replies. @mentions with notifications. Resolve/reopen workflow.

node.title: 8.2 Review Workflow
node.comment: ROI: Structured review process reduces errors by 70%.

node.title: Track Changes
node.comment: Record all edits with attribution. Accept/reject interface. Batch operations.

node.title: Approval System
node.comment: Multi-stage approval workflow. Role-based permissions. Audit trail.

node.title: Version Comparison
node.comment: Side-by-side diff view. Three-way merge. Restore previous versions.

node.title: 8.3 Team Management
node.comment: ROI: Centralized management saves 2hrs/week in coordination.

node.title: Workspace Sharing
node.comment: Share projects with permissions. Guest access with expiration. Link-based sharing.

node.title: Template Library
node.comment: Team-wide processing templates. Centralized prompt library. Style guide enforcement.

node.title: Usage Analytics
node.comment: Track team productivity. Cost allocation. ROI reporting.

node.title: 9. Advanced Search and Navigation UX
node.comment: Powerful search capabilities that make finding content instant, even across thousands of transcripts.

node.title: 9.1 Intelligent Search Engine
node.comment: ROI: Find any content in seconds, not minutes. 90% faster than manual scanning.

node.title: Multi-Index Search
node.comment: Search across: transcript text, speaker names, timestamps, comments, metadata.

node.title: Fuzzy Matching
node.comment: Phonetic search for unclear audio. Typo tolerance. Synonym expansion.

node.title: Regular Expressions
node.comment: Power user regex search. Pattern library. Visual regex builder.

node.title: Semantic Search
node.comment: AI-powered concept search. Find by meaning, not just keywords. Topic clustering.

node.title: 9.2 Navigation Intelligence
node.comment: ROI: Navigate complex projects 5x faster with smart navigation.

node.title: Smart Jump
node.comment: Jump to: next error, speaker change, topic shift, bookmark, low confidence.

node.title: Breadcrumb System
node.comment: Navigation history with preview. Back/forward with context. Jump list.

node.title: Mini-Map
node.comment: Document overview with highlights. Click to navigate. Search result indicators.

node.title: 9.3 Project-Wide Search
node.comment: ROI: Manage large projects with hundreds of files efficiently.

node.title: Cross-File Search
node.comment: Search across entire project. Filter by date, speaker, duration, confidence.

node.title: Search Results Manager
node.comment: Persistent search results. Export search findings. Bulk operations on results.

node.title: Saved Searches
node.comment: Save complex queries. Share with team. Schedule automated searches.

node.title: 10. Professional Export Pipeline UX
node.comment: Export system that handles every professional use case, from subtitles to API integrations. MacWhisper's weak point.

node.title: 10.1 Format Mastery
node.comment: ROI: One-click export to any format saves 30min per project in manual formatting.

node.title: Industry Standard Formats
node.comment: SRT, VTT, ASS, TTML, STL, DFXP, EDL, XML, JSON, CSV. Premiere/FCP/Resolve compatible.

node.title: Document Formats
node.comment: Word with styles, PDF with bookmarks, HTML with player, Markdown with YAML frontmatter.

node.title: Custom Format Designer
node.comment: Visual format builder. Template language. Regex transformations. Share custom formats.

node.title: 10.2 Export Automation
node.comment: ROI: Eliminate manual export tasks, saving 1hr/day for production teams.

node.title: Export Presets
node.comment: Multi-format export in one click. Conditional exports. Format bundling (transcript + subtitles + chapters).

node.title: Post-Export Actions
node.comment: Auto-upload to cloud, email delivery, FTP transfer, API webhook, open in app.

node.title: Scheduled Exports
node.comment: Daily report generation. Periodic backups. Deadline-based delivery.

node.title: 10.3 Integration Pipelines
node.comment: ROI: Direct integration saves 45min/day in manual transfer and formatting.

node.title: Direct App Export
node.comment: Send to: Notion, Obsidian, Roam, Final Cut, Premiere, Resolve, Slack, Teams.

node.title: API Endpoints
node.comment: RESTful API for automation. Webhook triggers. Zapier/Make/IFTTT templates.

node.title: Database Export
node.comment: PostgreSQL, MySQL, MongoDB schemas. Bulk insert scripts. Incremental updates.

node.title: 11. Performance and Optimization Requirements
node.comment: Performance targets that ensure VoiceFlowPro feels faster and more responsive than any competitor.

node.title: 11.1 Startup Performance
node.comment: ROI: Fast startup saves 5min/day for users who open the app multiple times.

node.title: Cold Start Target
node.comment: Under 2 seconds to interactive UI. Progressive loading with immediate responsiveness.

node.title: Warm Start Target
node.comment: Under 500ms when backgrounded. Instant resume from system tray.

node.title: Project Load Time
node.comment: Open 100GB project in under 5 seconds. Lazy loading with preview generation.

node.title: 11.2 Memory Efficiency
node.comment: ROI: Run alongside other pro apps without system slowdown.

node.title: Baseline Memory
node.comment: Under 200MB idle. Under 500MB with project open. Model memory mapped, not loaded.

node.title: Memory Scaling
node.comment: Linear scaling with project size. Automatic cache pruning. Low memory mode.

node.title: Leak Prevention
node.comment: Zero memory leaks in 24hr operation. Automated testing. Memory profiling tools.

node.title: 11.3 Battery Optimization
node.comment: ROI: 2x longer battery life than competitors for mobile professionals.

node.title: Efficiency Modes
node.comment: Auto-switch to efficiency cores on battery. Reduce update frequency. Pause background tasks.

node.title: GPU Management
node.comment: Prefer integrated GPU on battery. Aggressive power gating. Thermal throttling.

node.title: 12. Accessibility and Inclusion
node.comment: Full accessibility support making VoiceFlowPro usable by everyone, opening enterprise markets with compliance requirements.

node.title: 12.1 Screen Reader Support
node.comment: ROI: Meet compliance requirements for enterprise and government contracts.

node.title: Full ARIA Labels
node.comment: Every UI element properly labeled. Semantic HTML structure. Role attributes.

node.title: Navigation Announcements
node.comment: Announce mode changes, selections, operations. Configurable verbosity.

node.title: Transcript Reading
node.comment: Natural reading with speaker identification. Pause at punctuation. Speed control.

node.title: 12.2 Visual Accessibility
node.comment: ROI: Usable by 15% more users with visual impairments.

node.title: High Contrast Modes
node.comment: True high contrast themes. WCAG AAA compliance. Custom contrast adjustment.

node.title: Font Scaling
node.comment: 200% zoom without horizontal scroll. Responsive layout. Minimum touch targets.

node.title: Color Blind Modes
node.comment: Deuteranopia, protanopia, tritanopia themes. Pattern alternatives to color.

node.title: 12.3 Motor Accessibility
node.comment: ROI: Usable by users with motor impairments, expanding market.

node.title: Sticky Keys Support
node.comment: Sequential key combinations. Configurable delays. Visual feedback.

node.title: Large Click Targets
node.comment: Minimum 44x44px targets. Spacing between actions. Error prevention.

node.title: Voice Control
node.comment: Basic voice commands for navigation and control. OS integration.

node.title: 13. Implementation Architecture Considerations
node.comment: Technical architecture decisions based on existing codebase analysis and proven web implementation success.

node.title: 13.2 Electron Architectural Pattern
node.comment: Proven architecture pattern optimizing for security, performance, and maintainability.

node.title: 14. Development Roadmap Based on Analysis
node.comment: Phased development approach optimized for rapid value delivery and code reuse from existing implementation.

node.title: 14.1 Phase 1: Foundation (Week 1)
node.comment: Establish desktop foundation leveraging proven web components. Target: Working MVP with core transcription.

node.title: Success Criteria Phase 1
node.comment: Measurable deliverables for phase 1 completion.
node.code:
Phase 1 Success Metrics: ☐ Electron app launches in < 2 seconds ☐ Existing React UI renders correctly ☐ File import dialog works ☐ WhisperWebEngine transcribes audio files ☐ Results display in familiar UI ☐ Window state persists across restarts ☐ No memory leaks in 1-hour operation ☐ Basic keyboard shortcuts functional
Technical Deliverables: ☐ Main process with secure IPC ☐ Preload script with context isolation ☐ Renderer process with React integration ☐ WhisperService wrapping existing engine ☐ Basic file handling and import ☐ Window management system ☐ Settings persistence with electron-store
